meanings.definition: In the best or most favorable way
meanings.sent1: She performed optimally during the exam.
meanings.sent2: The machine was running optimally after the repairs.
meanings.sent3: The cat slept optimally on top of the warm laundry.
meanings.sent4: His car's engine purred optimally after the tune-up.
meanings.sent5: The athlete trained optimally to achieve peak performance.

meanings.definition: In a way that is most efficient or effective
meanings.sent1: The team worked optimally to finish the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: By following the instructions optimally, she completed the puzzle quickly.
meanings.sent3: The robot vacuum cleaned optimally, amusing the family with its precision.
meanings.sent4: Her speech flowed optimally, captivating the audience with every word.
meanings.sent5: The plant grew optimally in the sunlight, reaching its full potential.
